p: No statistically significant differences in change from pre-ASCT baseline values were observed between the groups receiving any maintenance therapy and lenalidomide-only maintenance therapy versus the group receiving no maintenance therapy for the FACT-MM total score (Fig. 3a, b), TOI score (Fig. 4a, b), and myeloma subscale score (Fig. 5a, b; Table 7 [Online Resource 1]). Across the treatment groups, FACT-MM total score, TOI score, and MM subscale score increased significantly from pre-ASCT to the follow-up period ( P < 0.001 for all groups) and decreased significantly at progression ( P < 0.01, all groups; Figs. 3c, 4c, and 5c).
